kuusisto.tinysound.internal
Class MusicReference

java.lang.Object
  kuusisto.tinysound.internal.MusicReference

public class MusicReference
extends Object

The MusicReference class is the Mixers interface to the audio data of a Music object. MusicReference is an internal class of the TinySound system and should be of no real concern to the average user of TinySound.

Author:
Finn Kuusisto

Constructor Detail

MusicReference

public MusicReference(byte[] left,
                      byte[] right,
                      boolean playing,
                      boolean loop,
                      int loopPosition,
                      int position,
                      double volume)
Construct a new MusicReference with the given audio data and settings.

Parameters:
left - left channel of music data
right - right channel of music data
playing - true if the music should be playing
loop - true if the music should loop
position - byte index position in music data
volume - volume to play the music

nextTwoBytes

public void nextTwoBytes(int[] data,
                         boolean bigEndian)
Get the next two bytes from the music data in the specified endianness.

Parameters:
data - length-2 array to write in next two bytes from each channel
bigEndian - true if the bytes should be read big-endian
